Job Description: Vacature van Adecco, locatie Den Bosch, , Are you a dedicated Production Teamleader and are you looking for a new job with a lot of responsibility Do you want to work in an international multicultural working environment Continue reading We are looking for a dedicated Production Team Leader to independently manage the Production department in sHertogenbosch, , , , Responsible for the operation of a section process within the Production function in the SMC site, supporting the Supervisor with the daytoday operation, overseeing a group of members and ensuring an efficient operation in achieving business targets Provide leadership and line management to the team, coordinating their workloads, providing support to ensure that the team delivers, monitoring any issues, and ensuring production targets, Key Performance Indicators KPIs, and quality standards are met in order to meet the requirements of the customer, , Develop the team by focusing on individual performance and support requirements to achieve high standards, whilst fostering a culture of working safely Work under general supervision, reviewed and supported by the Supervisor and Management, , , , Our client is a world leader in IT products The servers are built in Den Bosch, where they have their own production department, , In addition to a nice salary, you will be reimbursed for your travel expenses When the client is satisfied with you, it is possible to get a permanent contract after 8 months In addition, you have many international colleagues to work with Communication is in English, all information from the company is also in English, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , 5cd8a0b9cc68f9ffa4c9253553278a55

The company Flamco in BunschotenSpakenburg is looking for a production employee At Flamco you can work fulltime during the week of in the weekend If you like to work in an industrial environment, this is the job for you, wat bieden wij jou, , , , You cant reach Flamco with the public transport Thats why you need to have a car to travel with Also you need to live a maximum of 40 km from Flamco This because of the maximum travel allowance that we pay max 9,81 each day, , , , As a production employee you will help produce different parts from the boiler At Flamco you will get the chance to start at the bottom and develop yourself At Flamco you will work in a busy environment As a production employee you will work at the line with a colleague With your colleague you will put two parts together This is heavy work where you have to keep the speed of the line, Do you work a longer time at Flamco Then you can grow from your position as a production employee You can grow to an operator, welder or a reach trucker, , , , Flamco is a company that makes boilers an parts of a boiler The company exists since the 50s In the 50s they made their own expansion vessel With this Flamco became a big company Flamco is always improving their products and their quality As a production employee you will be part of a great company, , Are you excited after reading this vacancy Apply on the job and i will give you a call Make sure that your resume is on your profile Talk to you soon, Uiteraard staat deze vacature open voor iedereen die zich hierin herkent, , Opleiding, , VMBO  MBO1

Vacature van Randstad, locatie Den Bosch, , For Super Micro in sHertogenbosch we are looking for a Material Management Its a fulltime job in daytime shift We normal working times are from 900 till 1730 At this moment they are working in shifts to create a safer environment due to Corona One week you will work Monday  Wednesday  Friday from 800  2000 and the other week from Tuesday  Thursday  Saturday from 800  2000 You get paid for 40 hours, , , , , For this job its necessary that you sprak English because its a multi cultural company If you have some experience working in a warehouse of production area its a plus But most important is that you are willing to learn, can work concentrated and precise

Teammanager Productie, Working for a leading sciencebased agtech company, You are member of the Plant management team, About Our Client, Syngenta is a global company with headquarters in Switzerland 28,000 employees in 90 countries are working to transform how crops are grown and protected, , , , In this role you are leading three teams within the Vegetables and Flowers seeds processing plant As a Group Lead, you demonstrate leadership on HSE and Quality, and motivate, stimulate and educate your people to reach the departmental goals You are responsible for managing all costs of the department by preparing budget for next years and align these with the approved budget during the year As a member of the Plant management team, you proactively contribute to develop  implement the plant strategic and operational objectives towards establishing a high performing and continuously learning organisation to assure end to end result, , You have extensive experience in operations management and the application of different lean techniques, preferably in an environment with biological variation Experience with industrial automation is preferred You hold a bachelors degree in business administration or related field You have strong analytical skills as well as the ability to translate complex challenges into pragmatic solutions You are a team player and have experience in effective stakeholder management You are fluent in both English and Dutch You are eager to learn and can understand the complexity of our business, , , , Good salary package
